content.text: Match ends, Supersport United 2, Manchester City 0.
Second Half ends, Supersport United 2, Manchester City 0.
Attempt blocked. Scott Sinclair (Manchester City) right footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by James Milner.
James Milner (Manchester City) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Innocent Mdledle (Supersport United).
Offside, Supersport United. George Maluleka tries a through ball, but Bradley Grobler is caught offside.
Attempt saved. Mogogi Gabonamong (Supersport United) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the top centre of the goal. Assisted by Bradley Grobler.
Clifford Mulenga (Supersport United) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Shay Facey (Manchester City).
Offside, Supersport United. Kermit Erasmus tries a through ball, but Bradley Grobler is caught offside.
Substitution, Manchester City. Devante Cole replaces Yaya Touré.

Goal!  Supersport United 2, Manchester City 0. Kermit Erasmus (Supersport United) left footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Mogogi Gabonamong with a through ball.
Substitution, Supersport United. Roscoe Pietersen replaces Mame Mor Diouf.
